desc: Mantua Silkwear luxury scarves are limited edition, digitally printed and hand hemmed. Made from 100% silk and packaged in a silk pouch by hand. Original artworks, designed in South Africa, are painted in an array of expressive colourful patterns. Order online, payment is secure and delivery is door to door worldwide.

layout.text: A collection of printed silk scarves, robes, dresses and accessories.
